extensionDescription.message: Hides your messages until you hover over them.

toggleMessagesDescription.message: Blurs all messages in the chat.

toggleMessagesPreviewDescription.message: Blurs all message previews on the left.

toggleMediaPreviewDescription.message: Blurs all images, videos, stickers, ... in separation from the text.

toggleMediaGalleryDescription.message: Blurs all small preview icons of images, videos, ... while viewing an image, video, ...

toggleTextInputDescription.message: Makes the color in your input field lighter to make it hard to read.

toggleNoDelayDescription.message: Allows you to turn off the delay before revealing an item on hover.

toggleUnblurActiveDescription.message: Unblurs all when you hover over the WhatsApp Web app.

footerBugReportsDescription.message: When you encounter issues or have a feature request please email me: contact@lukaslen.com
